item.description:
I was at Willoughby's a few months ago.

We enjoyed their coffee & surroundings.

I am going there again.

A. http://www.willoughbyscoffee.com/

www.willoughbyscoffee.com

B. Look for Branford Location in the link.

Located at our coffee roasting plant.

Monday - Friday 6:30am-5:30pm

Saturday 7am-4pm

Closed Sundays.

http://www.willoughbyscoffee.com/locations.php

www.willoughbyscoffee.com/locations.php

C. http://www.merchantcircle.com/business/Willoughbys.Coffee.And.Tea.203-481-1700

www.merchantcircle.com/business/Willoughbys.Coffee.And.Tea.203-481-1700

I know that this place is too far from those living North of

New Haven off of I - 91

and West of Milford, so do not waste my In Box with messages

that you cannot make it because it is too far.

I will just delete if from my In Box and from Meet Up.

All Meet Ups depend on the weather.

If there is any bad weather then this Meet Up will be cancelled.

I will be going to see Dark Shadows later on that evening.

Mike B.

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes. I will have my Purple Backpack.
item.name: Coffee Talk @ Willoughby’s Coffee & Tea in Branford
